not_recommended_authors.name: Helena Blavatsky
reasons: Academic fraud regarding claimed esoteric knowledge
Foundational influence on problematic modern traditions

racism: Claimed African, Aboriginal Australian, and South Sea Islander peoples were biologically and spiritually inferior
Referred to Indigenous Australians as 'half-animal' in published works
Promoted hierarchical racial theories under guise of spiritual evolution
antisemitism: Characterized Judaism as 'a religion of hate and malice'
Misrepresented Jewish mysticism while denigrating its origins
Blamed Jewish traditions for perceived flaws in Christianity
academic_criticism: René Guénon demonstrated her works were compiled from existing texts, not supernatural sources (historical)
Professor Agehananda Bharati dismissed her work as 'horrendous hogwash' (anthropological)
Mircea Eliade proved her theories contradict authentic Eastern spiritual traditions (theological)
specific_issues.influence: Direct inspiration for Gerald Gardner's problematic Wiccan foundations
